DOC.brief_summary: The Foley catheter one component catheter insertion procedure could contribute catheter associate urinary tract infection ( CAUTI ) . Improvements catheter insertion procedure use ERASE CAUTI Tray system may help low infection rate .
DOC.brief_title: Study Compare CAUTI Rates Following ERASE CAUTI Tray Silver v Silver Coated Foley Catheters
DOC.criteria: At least 18 year age Received either silver coat Foley catheter ERASE CAUTI silver coat catheter UTI present upon current hospital admission Burn patient , transplant patient , immunecompromised patient .
